title: Sam Spiegel in a discussion with Ludovic Kennedy on the producer and the film
creator_credit: Hazel Wilkinson and British Film Institute
brief_description: Sam Spiegel discusses his work as a film producer. Scenes from “Lawrence of Arabia”, “On the Waterfront”, “The African Queen” and “The Bridge on the River Kwai” are shown.
